BPMtext: This button starts the metronome according to the input BPM.
Manualtext: This button toggles manual mode. When active, you can manually play the "Ching" and "Chap" sounds.
Playtext: Tap this button twice to start the metronome. The interval you tap will determine the metronome's rhythm.
Stoptext: Press this button to stop the metronome after the current cycle finishes.
